"Senior Delivery Manager

The Position:

LTI is looking for a Delivery manager to join our LowCode Practice in Hyderabad, we are looking to you to coach and guide scrum team with a focus on ensuring the team meet their project deliverables within the agile framework.

The DM will be engaged in the planning, organizing and managing of activities to achieve successful completion of agile projects to ensure commitments on quality, scope, time and budget are met. The functional groups that the Scrum Master partners with include Development Teams, Product Management, and Release Management.

In this role, you will be

• Act as a coach and a facilitator for the team. Ensure adherence to agile methods and practices

• Collaborate with product owner to maintain product backlog

• Collaborate with team to plan sprints and releases

• Monitor/balance tasks among the delivery team

• Remove team delivery roadblocks

• Contributing to user stories and continually learning new tools and technics to manage yourself and a team

• Track the progress of User Stories throughout sprints and keep the team on track towards their commitments

• Monitor Sprint Planning, Backlog Refinement, Daily Standups, and Retrospective Sprint Ceremonies

• Act as the agent of change and continuously drive towards increasing Agile maturity, using KPIs to help the team improve their Agile process maturity

• Keep everyone focused on delivering business value

• Proactively identify performance issues and opportunities for action

• Influence situations through suggestions, training, and advice on both straightforward and complex issues, collaborating with other decision makers on day-to-day activities

• Practice the art of servant leadership and work to garner respect from the team

• Need to track revenue and resource offboarding and onboarding along with resource fulfilment

• Need to work on proactive opportunities from client (RPF’s)

• Having desire to bring disclosure and transparency to the business about development and grow business trust

 

Skills Required

• 2-4 years’ experience in delivering end-to-end Application using an Agile framework

• Strong understanding of SDLC Concepts

• Strong experience in executing projects using Pega SmartBPM methodology

• Experience working with large, small, remote, and collaborative agile teams

• Knowledge and/or experience with widely successful Agile techniques: User Stories, ATDD, TDD, Continuous Integration, Continuous Testing, Pairing, Automated Testing

• Ability to work independently with minimal direction

• Strong facilitation, communication, and negotiation skills

• Strong presentation and written skills, as well as excellent interpersonal skills

• Excellent listener and mentor with outstanding interpersonal conflict-resolutions skills, and the ability to work in collaborative environments

• Comfortable and articulate in challenging change management scenarios, knowing when to insert themselves and when to fade back

Experience

• 10+ years of experience in IT

• 4-5 years of experience in delivering Pega Projects

Qualification

• Graduation / Post Graduation

• Scrum Master certification (CSM or PSM or SAFe), as well as a track record of continued and recent education in Scrum, including training, conferences, user groups, self-study, etc. "

NATIVE HANA JD: SAP HANA Technical Developer

 

Required/Nice to have:

• Good hands-on experience in design & creation of SAP HANA 2.0 complex data modeling, Information Modeling in HANA is required and understanding in CDS Views, SAP programing ABAP on HANA is plus.

• Expert knowledge in design & creation of Information Models in HANA 2.0 using Attributes views, Analytic views, Calculation views, Synonyms, HANA Live Models consumption etc.

• Expert knowledge in BW on HANA and Native HANA is must and S4HANA and Embedded Analytics is an added advantage.

• Expert experience in HANA Modeling, SAP BI Information Modeling and HANA SQL Script, Table Functions, SQL Script Procedures is required and CDS, AMDP is added advantage.

• Translate the Business KPIs into HANA & Define the Reporting Layouts.

• Hands on experience in SAP Web IDE, Eclipse, HANA Studio and Git, Source Code Version Control Management is required and Business Technology Platform is an added advantage.

• Hands on experience in XSOData, XSA MTA is required and Fiori/UI5, ABAP on HANA, OData and ABAP is nice to have. He/She should also be able to debug the code.

• Experience and good knowledge of SQL Script Performance Analysis and debugging.

• Able to understand SAP/BW Transports, HANA Transports & Understanding in ChaRM is good to have.

• Define reusable components/frameworks, containers, common schema, standards to be used & tools to be used

• Working on Agile/Scrum Methodology is desirable.

• Strong analytical, problem solving and multi-tasking skills, as well as communication and interpersonal skills, is required.

• Prior experience in FICO or understanding of FI tables, transactions/processes involved is plus.

• Strong verbal and written communication skills, with an ability to express complex business concepts.
